product_name: CHANELL'EAU DE MOUSSE Anti-Pollution Water-to-Foam Cleanser
summary: SummaryAn ultra-gentle, soap-free cleanser ideal for sensitive skin types. With one pump, the self-foaming formula transforms from a micellar water into a soft, cushiony lather that removes pollutants, oil and sunscreen. The complexion feels refreshed, hydrated and supple, with a healthy-looking glow.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsRemineralizing marine spring water, combined with a purifying amino acid derivative offer a mild yet complete cleanse that won't strip or dry out delicate complexions.Blue Micro-Algae helps protect skin against pollution, while Marine Salicornia Extract hydrates and fortifies.Item 2585258How To UseMorning and evening, apply 1 pump to damp skin. Massage with a circular movement and rinse well with water.IngredientsAqua (Water), Lauryl Glucoside, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Diglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Algae Extract, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Maris Aqua (Sea Water), Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylyl Glycol, Polyglycerin-3, Arginine, Potassium Sorbate, Coconut Acid, Gypsophila Paniculata Root Extract, Phytic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, IL57B.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Morning and evening, apply 1 pump to damp skin. Massage with a circular movement and rinse well with water.

reviews.headline: Le ew mousse dolls!
reviews.comments: Lovely scent, nice soft gentle rich foam for a water to foam formula. Rinses off clean and doesnt leave skin feeling tight or red honey < 3 aesthetically pleasing packaging because she is that Coco.

reviews.headline: Best way to start your day
reviews.comments: My staple AM cleanser. Gentle but lightly cleansing foam. I do not smell any lingering scent after. I enjoy the scent but as with all Chanel, if you are very sensitive to anything fragrance, proceed with caution. I have been using for a couple of years now, no sensitivity/breakouts. Leaves my skin nice and soft for the rest of my AM routine. Wish Chanel would not keep raising prices but great cleanser.

reviews.headline: One of my favorite face washes
reviews.comments: This is only one of two face washes that doesnt break out my sensetive skin. It is gentle yet clarifying. The scent is light and doesnt bother me. Im on my second bottle of this and definitely will be buying another one when i run out.

reviews.headline: Love it!!
reviews.comments: I bought this and absolutely love it!! I will definitely buy it again!!

reviews.headline: The smell
reviews.comments: It works great for removing makeup. Cleanses well, no breakouts. Nice glow after. But the smell is terrible. It smells like saliva. It's overpowering even after you wash your face you can still smell it. Won't repurchase for that alone.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy against strong scent
reviews.comments: It definitely cleans but has to strong of a scent for me.

reviews.headline: One of my favorite cleansers
reviews.comments: Love everything about this cleanser it give me this radiant glow afterwards I love using it as a double cleanse!! :)

reviews.headline: Favorite face wash!
reviews.comments: It smells SO beautiful, 2 pumps is enough to clean your face and it removes make-up well without using a remover first. It wish the bottle was larger, but I highly recommend this cleaner. I would love a body lotion that smells the same.

reviews.headline: Clean
reviews.comments: Keeps my face clean & clear. I somehow get breakouts but not from this face wash. Very luxurious.

faceoff_positive.comments: My staple AM cleanser. Gentle but lightly cleansing foam. I do not smell any lingering scent after. I enjoy the scent but as with all Chanel, if you are very sensitive to anything fragrance, proceed with caution. I have been using for a couple of years now, no sensitivity/breakouts. Leaves my skin nice and soft for the rest of my AM routine. Wish Chanel would not keep raising prices but great cleanser.
